pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Dimensional Analysis of Variance // Functions and datasets to support Smilde, Marini, Westerhuis and Liland (2025, ISBN: 978-1-394-21121-0) "Analysis of Variance for High-Dimensional Data - Applications in Life, Food and Chemical Sciences". This implements and imports a collection of methods for HD-ANOVA data analysis with common interfaces, result- and plotting functions, multiple real data sets and four vignettes covering a range different applications.
